summary: A comprehensive set of unit‑test modules that exercise and validate the Cython compiler’s core components—including parsing of buffers, memoryviews, grammar rules, command‑line options, scanning, type handling, signature matching, tree transformations, flow‑control graphs, and built‑in function support—while providing helper utilities for isolated test environments.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability and regression‑free evolution of the Cython compiler by automatically testing language features, compiler directives, and internal utilities, thereby supporting developers and downstream users who rely on reliable Cython code generation.
